news.title: GM raises quarterly dividend, initiates $6 billion stock buyback
news.summary: General Motors says it is raising its quarterly dividend and initiating a new $6 billion share repurchase program. General Motors said Wednesday that it is raise its quarterly dividends and initiate a new £5 billion share buyback program.

news.title: TJ Maxx parent company posts strong holiday, but issues weaker-than-expected guidance
news.summary: The company behind T.J. Maxx, Marshall's and Home Goods has seen growth start to slow down. But it's one of the few retailers that could benefit from tariffs.

news.title: Lowe's beats Wall Street expectations as it starts to break out of sales slump
news.summary: Lowe's followed rival Home Depot in reporting better-than-expected quarterly sales. Lowe's reported better than expected quarterly sales, beating expectations.

news.title: Ukraine reportedly agrees to critical rare minerals deal with the U.S.
news.summary: Ukraine and the U.S. reach an agreement over access to Kyiv's deposits of rare earth minerals, according to media reports. Ukraine and the United States reached an agreement.

news.title: Mortgage rates drop to lowest since mid-December, but demand still falls short
news.summary: applications for a mortgage to purchase a home were flat for the week and 3% higher than the same week one year ago. Applications for a Mortgage to Purchase a Home were Flat for the Week.

news.title: Oil prices trade at 2025 lows on tariff fears, hopes for end to Ukraine war
news.summary: Oil futures edged lower early Wednesday, maintaining a weak tone. Concerns over the global economic outlook and the potential for a halt to Russia’s war on Ukraine could result in sanctions being loosened.

news.title: Bloomin’ Brands’ stock slides as revenue falls short for a sixth straight quarter
news.summary: The parent company of Outback Steakhouse swings to a loss. The company offers soft guidance for 2025 amid continued pressure on fast-casual dining.

news.title: Investors love Buffett and then ignore what he says. How to avoid these mistakes made in 2024.
news.summary: Larry Swedroe, author of several investing books, talks about the biggest mistakes investors make year after year. Swedroe talks about how they can break the cycle.

news.title: Value investor Bill Nygren explains why Nvidia isn’t the best AI stock to own now
news.summary: Look at companies that use AI effectively, not AI hardware manufacturers, Oakmark Fund manager says. Oakmark is a manager of the Oakmark AI Fund, which invests in companies using AI.

news.title: North Korea’s $1.5 billion crypto hack is chump change — given what’s lurking
news.summary: Crypto’s vulnerability to theft will keep bitcoin from widespread use, experts say. ‘I’m worried about the future of bitcoin,’ one analyst says. “It’ll be hard to get people to use it.”
